content.blanksText:
• 1. Yesterday, I *learned* a new song on the guitar.

• 2. She *caught* the ball during the game.

• 3. He *fell* off his bike but wasn't hurt.

• 4. We *sang* at the concert last night.

• 5. They *took* a shortcut to get here faster.

• 6. I *ate* a huge sandwich for lunch.

• 7. My brother *bought* a new video game.

• 8. She *got* a gift for her birthday.

• 9. The plant *grew* a lot over the summer.

• 10. They *gave* their old clothes to charity.

• 11. She *said* she would call me later.

• 12. I *found* a twenty-dollar bill on the street.

• 13. The teacher *taught* us about the solar system.

• 14. I *wrote* an email to my cousin in Spain.

• 15. Our team *won* the basketball game.

• 16. He *had* a big breakfast this morning.

• 17. We *spoke* about the project yesterday.

• 18. They *did* their homework before going out to play.

• 19. I *made* a cake for her birthday.

• 20. She *went* to the grocery store.

• 21. He *threw* the paper into the recycling bin.

• 22. I *read* a chapter of my book.

• 23. She *brought* snacks for everyone.

• 24. He *rode* his bike to the park.

• 25. They *swam* in the lake all afternoon.

• 26. I *heard* a strange noise last night.

• 27. She *thought* the movie was amazing.

• 28. He *lost* his keys but found them later.

• 29. I *let* my friend borrow my notes.

• 30. *Could* you pass the salt, please?

• 31. She *put* the book on the shelf.

• 32. We *met* at the café.

• 33. He *broke* his phone screen.

• 34. I *knew* the answer to the question.

• 35. They *left* the house early this morning.

• 36. I *felt* great after the workout.

• 37. She *was* busy all day.

• 38. The bell *rang* at noon.

• 39. They *came* to the party together.

• 40. I *saw* a shooting star last night.

• 41. The bird *flew* away when I got closer.

notFilledOut: Please fill in all blanks to view solution

confirmCheck.body: Are you sure you wish to finish?

confirmRetry.body: Are you sure you wish to retry?
